translations: adj.第二十的；二十分之一的

sentences.sentence: "After the twentieth try," Wendy reminded him.
sentences.translation: “已经尝试了二十次。”温迪提醒他。

sentences.sentence: World War I left an indelible imprint on the twentieth-century world.
sentences.translation: 第一次世界大战给20世纪的世界留下了深远的影响。

sentences.sentence: Some have called him the greatest entertainer of the twentieth century.
sentences.translation: 有人称他为20世纪最伟大的表演艺术家。
